thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Rex Trueform HY HEPS Rises 70.9 Pct To 38.8 Cents

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rex Trueform HY HEPS Rises 70.9 Pct To 38.8 Cents
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Rex Trueform Group Ltd:
* HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 70.9% TO 38.8 CENTS
* HY ‍REVENUE INCREASED BY 13.1% TO R317.7 MILLION ​ * HY ORDINARY DIVIDEND PER SHARE PAID AMOUNTED TO NIL CENTS (31 DECEMBER 2016: 27 CENTS)
* ‍HY NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED BY 3.2% TO R12.99​
* CURRENT TOUGH ECONOMIC TRADING AND MARKET CONDITIONS ARE STILL LIKELY TO CONTINUE TO IMPACT BUSINESS IN SHORT TERM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
